;History of The Omega Replica Watches
;
;The forerunner of Omega replica watches was founded at La Chaux-de-Fonds, Switzerland in 1848 by 23-12 months-outdated Louis Brant, who assembled important-wound precision pocket watches from components supplied by regional craftsmen. He marketed his watches from Italy to Scandinavia by way of England, his chief market place. Right after Louis Brandt's loss of life in 1879, his two sons Louis-Paul and César, troubled by irregular deliveries of questionable top quality, abandoned the unsatisfactory assembly workshop program in favour of in-residence manufacturing and whole manufacturing handle. Because of to the larger provide of manpower, communications and energy in Biel, the enterprise moved into a tiny factory in January 1880, then bought the total constructing in December. Two a long time later the firm moved into a transformed spinning-factory in the Gurzelen district of Biel, wherever headquarters are still located right now. Their very first series-made calibres, Labrador and Gurzelen, as nicely as the renowned Omega calibre of 1894, would guarantee the brand's advertising results.
;
;Louis-Paul and César Brandt each died in 1903, leaving one particular of Switzerland's largest enjoy firms — with 240,000 watches developed annually and using 800 individuals — in the arms of four youthful individuals, the oldest of whom, Paul-Emile Brandt, was not however 24. Brandt was the excellent architect and builder of Omega. His have an impact on would be felt more than the subsequent 50 percent-century. The financial problems brought on by the Initial Earth War would lead him to work actively from 1925 towards the union of Omega and Tissot, then to their merger in 1930 inside the group SSIH, Geneva. Below his leadership, and from 1955 that of Joseph Reiser, the SSIH Group ongoing to grow and multiply, absorbing or creating some fifty companies.
